name: Unique Sylvie Game
description:
This is a unique game by Sylvie.

It's available for purchase.

The game is overpriced right now but it will go on sale every so often when there's a special itch.io sale or event.

Someday it will be released for free, but it depends when I feel like it.

Update

The game was updated (2022-07-30) to add a second level and change some small things about the movement.

Information
  • It is a platformer with unique movement.
  • Sylvie gets money in the game.
  • It was made in less than 12 hours.
  • It is a difficult game.
  • The mechanics are hard to understand.
  • It is a rage game.
  • It will become free someday but the time is unknown.
  • Controls: Arrows to move, X/Space to jump, C/Ctrl to use ability.
  • The game only has two levels.
  • The game doesn't really make sense.
  • Game ends when you touch the kitten.
  • It runs at 24 fps.
  • A Windows version and web browser version are available.
  • Once Sylvie starts rolling, there's nothing you can do.
  • Only buy it if you have read all information.
  • There are no secrets.
  • You can't rebind the controls.
  • Gold money bags are worth 5$ and normal are worth 1$.
  • If you record a video to show me how you play, I would be happy.
  • Sorry if you don't like it.
